Returns: Returns the acquisition start time of the assist data, in milliseconds.
getAcquisitionStartTime().Description: Returns the time when the activity started generating assist data to build the AssistStructure. The time is as specified by @B_android#os#SystemClock#uptimeMillis_E@.

Returns: Whether the activity was the home activity.
isHomeActivity().Description: Returns whether the activity associated with this AssistStructure was the home activity (Launcher) at the time the assist data was acquired.

getActivityComponent().Description: Return the activity this AssistStructure came from.

Returns: Returns the acquisition end time of the assist data, in milliseconds.
getAcquisitionEndTime().Description: Returns the time when the activity finished generating assist data to build the AssistStructure. The time is as specified by @B_android#os#SystemClock#uptimeMillis_E@.

getWindowNodeCount().Description: Return the number of window contents that have been collected in this assist data.

Parameters: int: Which window to retrieve, may be 0 to @B_android#app#assist#AssistStructure#getWindowNodeCount_E@-1.
getWindowNodeAt(int).Description: Return one of the windows in the assist data.

Returns: a bitmask indicating the set of special object types marshaled by this Parcelable object instance. Value is either 0 or @B_android#os#Parcelable#CONTENTS_FILE_DESCRIPTOR_E@
describeContents().Description: Describe the kinds of special objects contained in this Parcelable instance's marshaled representation. For example, if the object will include a file descriptor in the output of @B_android#os#Parcelable#writeToParcel_E@, the return value of this method must include the @B_android#os#Parcelable#CONTENTS_FILE_DESCRIPTOR_E@ bit.

ClassDesc: This API automatically creates assist data from the platform's implementation of assist and autofill. The structure is used for assist purposes when created by @B_android#app#Activity#onProvideAssistData_E@, @B_android#view#View#onProvideStructure_E@, or @B_android#view#View#onProvideVirtualStructure_E@. The structure is also used for autofill purposes when created by @B_android#view#View#onProvideAutofillStructure_E@, or @B_android#view#View#onProvideAutofillVirtualStructure_E@. For performance reasons, some properties of the assist data might only be available for assist or autofill purposes. In those cases, a property's availability will be documented in its javadoc.
